Actions.Text: REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY
REFERRED TO LIBRARIES AND EDUCATION TECHNOLOGY

Title: Relates to enacting the "books save lives act"
Summary: Relates to enacting the "books save lives act"; requires public school libraries receiving state aid to maintain a collection of diverse books.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring certain libraries to maintain a collection of diverse books
